Text: im, neen searchin for this for a long time, especaly "No ruinous feud" thanks !!!
Keep seeding please - lost all my original recordings of this beautiful music!
Thank you, thank you, thank you - to ib50 and all of the people who have seeded this for me and others - beautiful beautiful music.  Will seed for others whenever I can.

Won't someone with some real bandwidth seed this great collection for us? I'll continue to seed it as soon as I've got it. 

~ Music Lover

Thank you so much, brings back some good memories for me...
I'll seed for as long as I can...
Again Thanks
You are a hero for seeding this. The ISB gave me some of the most wonderful moments of my concert going lifee back in the 60's and 70's.

Congratulations on getting this superb collection together. I saw Mr Williamson about 10 years ago at a gig. He was still amazing then, playing his harp and telling his stories. Thanks for your much appreciated contribution to my music collection.
YOU'RE CRAZY MAN YOU'RE CRAZY! =D Where do you get all these from?=D

just so i could hear some ISB again then i thought stuff it il try download it first and lo and behold a complete discography 

thx allot m8 u saved me a massive hassel allthough after hearing wee tam and the big hugh again i know the epic tape adventure would have been worth it im just glad i didnt have to bother lol
